text: Amzad Hossain (Death: 9 May 2005) is a politician from Dinajpur District of Bangladesh. He was elected a member of parliament from Dinajpur-7 and Dinajpur-3. ==Career== Hossain was elected to parliament from Dinajpur-7 as a Awami League candidate in 1973. He was elected to parliament from Dinajpur-3 as a Awami League candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:2005 deaths Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Amzad Hossain (politician)
